title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Highwood Pass, Alberta
content:
Photo submitted by Tim Taylor-Smith, “Riding on Highway 40 toward the Highwood pass, Canada’s highest paved road.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here. *Please note that public […]

author: Kristi Benedict
